title: Solution proposed over prison congestion
content: The project proposal prepared by the Department of Prisons as a solution to prison congestion as well as for minor offences has been submitted to the Minister of Justice Ali Sabry. Under this, it is proposed that inmates who are remanded for minor offences be kept in their own homes for a specified period of time without being imprisoned. The Department of Prisons stated that they are being monitored by prison officials through technical procedures They will be allowed to leave the house only for limited and pre-approved activities, such as health needs and job requirements.
